long_description: Retire those other skis and let your girl step up to the lightweight, durable Line Snow Angel skis. They're perfectly calibrated for lightweight skiers so they can learn faster and have more fun. The nimble, light and easy-to-handle playful feel enables kids to progress quickly and have a good time anywhere on the mountain, at a great value. Aspen core consists of a blend of high-quality wood laminates that reduce weight and enhance overall strength. Fiberglass is layered in 4 directions around the core of the ski, providing uncompromised strength and snappy responsiveness. Symmetrical flex pattern in the tips and tails allows responsive riding forward or backward. Base or topsheet color may vary from online photo.
short_description: Retire those other skis and let your girl step up to the lightweight, durable Line Snow Angel skis. They're perfectly calibrated for lightweight skiers so they can learn faster and have more fun.
